sentences.en: Empty talk is of no help whatever to our modernization programme.
sentences.cn: 四个现代化靠空谈是化不出来的.

sentences.en: For these reasons, the bank chose it as their development tool for their modernization project.
sentences.cn: 出于这些理由，银行选择它作为其现代化项目的开发工具。

sentences.en: Great attention shall be paid to the modernization of our country.
sentences.cn: 必须充分重视我国的现代化问题.

sentences.en: I believe the children we help today will be well educated, which will contribute a lot to the modernization of our country.
sentences.cn: 我相信，我们今天帮助的孩子们会受到良好的教育， 而这将对我国的现代化作出巨大的贡献。

sentences.en: In its absence China would retrogress into division and chaos, and modernization would become impossible.
sentences.cn: 动摇了中国就要倒退到分裂和混乱, 就不可能实现现代化.

sentences.en: Industrial modernization opens up broad prospects for youth.
sentences.cn: 工业的现代化为青年开辟广阔的前程.

sentences.en: International competition is a spur to modernization.
sentences.cn: 国际间的竞争是走向现代化的动力.

sentences.en: Its method should be widely spreaded to stimulate the modernization of literature.
sentences.cn: 新月的策略应该推而广之成为文学现代化的策略.

sentences.en: Methods of management operation should also be changed to suit the needs of modernization.
sentences.cn: 管理方法也得改变一下以适应现代化的需要.

sentences.en: Modernization is the key to speed up our agricultural development.
sentences.cn: 现代化是加快农业发展的关键.

sentences.en: Stock raising industrialization is the important step that achieves stock raising modernization.
sentences.cn: 畜牧业产业化是实现畜牧业现代化的重要步骤.

sentences.en: The modernization of the industry was phased over at 20 - year period.
sentences.cn: 工业现代化分20年逐步实现.

sentences.en: The railways have been deprived of the money they need for modernization.
sentences.cn: 铁路系统被剥夺了那笔需要用于现代化的拨款.

sentences.en: These remarks relate to the industrial modernization.
sentences.cn: 这些话涉及工业的现代化.

sentences.en: This will help us achieve modernization.
sentences.cn: 这有助于我们实现现代化.

sentences.en: We must achieve modernization of science and technology, otherwise we will lag behind other nations.
sentences.cn: 我们必须实现科学技术现代化，否则我们要落后于其他国家。

sentences.en: We should all make contributions to the modernization of our country.
sentences.cn: 我们都应该对我国的现代化作出贡献。

sentences.en: We should exert ourselves in the struggle for the modernization of science and technology.
sentences.cn: 我们应为实现科学技术现代化而努力.

sentences.en: Yesterday, we saw the cloture of the Medicare Modernization Act.
sentences.cn: 昨天，我们看到医疗现代化法案的讨论终结。
